attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: buildiers,plasterers,electricions and plumbers are out of work due to high costs and high interest rates.we need to keep our skilled trades men.ask the prime minster to do something about the building trade before it collapses.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
